title: ★ SUNNY ★ Allston 1 Bdrm ★ Avail 9/1
posting_body: Spacious sunny 1 bedroom apartment in Allston.
This unit has been gut renovated.
Modern galley kitchen has been renovated with white cabinets,  granite counter tops  and stainless steel appliances.
Living room has a decorative fireplace.
Heat and hot water are included in the rent.
Additional features are crown molding, detailed woodwork and wainscoting, high ceilings, recessed lights and ceiling fans.
Accessible to restaurants, cafes, shopping, supermarkets and Harvard Avenue Train Station.
Cambridge St opp Hano St (0.29 mi)
Bus: 57 Brighton Ave @ Harvard Ave (0.13 mi)
Bus: 501 Cambridge St opp Hano St (0.29 mi)
Rail: Framingham/Worcester Line Boston Landing (0.59 mi)
Bus: 66 Harvard Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.06 mi)
